email.title: Weekly Digest

image.title: So much content warrants more biscuits. Submit yours today! (See below)

email.text:
Hello everyone,
Yeah, there was no digest last week. There wasn't much going on anyway.
This week, however, there's a bar night! The final one of the term! It's on **SATURDAY**.
We wish everyone the best of luck with their exams both this week and after the spring break. The digest will be back after exams!
email.heading: G-Research End of Term Bar Night

event.text:
DoCSoc's final bar night of the term is happening, kindly brought to you by G-Research!
We will be enjoying free drinks (alcoholic or not), and celebrating our successes throughout this term, don't miss it!
Note that this event is on a SATURDAY - the day after term ends. Book your flights and trains home accordingly! 18+ only - IDs will be checked.

email.sign:
That's all for now!
Until next term,
email.text: This week's biscuit brought to you by: Anonymous. [Submit Biscuit](https://docsoc.co.uk/suggest-biscuit).
